nodes.text: The Claer system was located in the Sern sector, a part of the Southern Core portion of the Colonies. The star system contained the astronomical object Clær, which was the site of an exclusive preparatory academy at some point between 5 BBY and 0 BBY.
The Claer system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square L-13.
